Module br.ufrn.imd.Visao
Package br.ufrn.imd.DAO

Class UsuariosDAO

java.lang.Object
br.ufrn.imd.DAO.UsuariosDAO
public class UsuariosDAO extends Object
UsuariosDAO class that stores an ArrayList of Usuario class also implements singleton architecture to manage the array.
Author:
Caio Vitor

    javafx.collections.ObservableList<String>
